bowling.model

Class SpecialFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • bowling.model.Frame
      • bowling.model.SpecialFrame

  • public class SpecialFrame
extends Frame
    This class represents the 10th frame if it becomes an special frame like when the player has a third shot.
